function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Heterogeneous access to UGS limiting benefits and exacerbating pandemic impact.","Impact":"Reduced well-being, increased spread of contagious diseases, and social disconnection.","Mitigation":"Implementing a more equitable distribution of UGS, providing access to integrated spaces, and raising public awareness.","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, GIS mapping, public health campaigns.","People":"Citizens with limited access to UGS, densely populated urban areas, and communities at risk of contagion.","Owner":"Urban planners, government authorities, public health organizations."}]}
